author: Parth MN
title: Alarm as medics at upmarket Mumbai hospital infected with virus
description: Over 200 healthcare workers infected with coronavirus in India's financial hub as official says no shortage of PPE.
content:
Mumbai, India - At least 36 medical workers, mostly nurses, who work for the upmarket Jaslok Hospital in Mumbai, have tested positive for the coronavirus, raising alarm over the spread of the virus in the Indian financial hub.
They are among more than 200 me… [+3479 chars]
